posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.95 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Help keep important information easily accessible with pinned messages. Your most frequently asked questions, dinner reservations, and vacation itineraries are already top of mind. Now they can be top of chat as well.

Backups is now available in production as well as TestFlight, but your early feedback is still crucial for us as we roll this out to a broader audience.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter!

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you’re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.94 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.95.0.1338-beta

46 new commits since 7.94.0.1335-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.95 [1]

  • Fix sendability checks for outgoing messages [2]

  • Use failIfThrows in AttachmentStore [3]

  • Move post-send view once logic out of protocol [4]

  • Remove Note to Self logic from protocol [5]

  • Use some Sequence<...> for send status updates [6]

  • Structify DisappearingMessagesConfigurationRecord [7]

  • Don’t check transient messages for deletion [8]

  • Remove extraneous " from SQL string [9]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.86.16 [10]

  • Fix disappearing message change check [11]

  • Remove some no-longer-relevant BuildFlags and RemoteConfigs [12]

  • Add X-Signal-Agent to attributes during reg [13]

  • Add UI for Key Transparency to FingerprintViewController [14]

  • Fix invalid quoted voice message thumbnails [15]

  • Use remote config for backup attachment max size [16]

  • Add dedicated remote configs for video limits [17]

  • Add attachment size hard limit [18]

  • Add first draft of KeyTransparencyManager [19]

  • Integrate KeyTransparencyManager/prepare() into FingerprintViewController [20]

  • Integrate KeyTransparencyManager.perform() into FingerprintViewController [21]

  • Member label send & receive [22]

  • Handle member labels with long profile names better [23]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.87.0 [24]

  • Member labels for interna [25]

  • Add additional debugging to BackupAttachmentUploadScheduler [26]

  • Allow searching for message timestamp from chat list [27]

  • Pass 'userProfileWriter' in to the ProfileFetcher job. [28]

  • Use DebouncedEvents for OrphanAttachmentCleaner [29]

  • Use DebouncedEvents for getAvailableDiskSpace [30]

  • Bump some constants related to post-backup download performance [31]

  • Add Debug UI checks [32]

  • allow emoji in member labels [33]

  • Add internal testing flag to force direct calls [34]

  • Add plumbing for VP9 remote config / setting [35]

  • Member labels + backups [36]

  • Use constant for space for attachment downloads [37]

  • Enable new attachment limits [38]

  • Member label VoiceOver support [39]

  • Re-schedule bg tasks if needed when they finish [40]

  • Add new member label in a place I forgot [41]

  • Move several UIImage extensions out of SSK and into SignalUI. [42]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.64.1 [43]

  • Swiftify infoMessagePreviewText(…) [44]

  • Update release notes [45]

  • Update translations [46]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.94.0.1335-beta…7.95.0.1338-beta

link_counts.title: Key Transparency is coming to Signal?

posts.cooked:
Backup failed on my iPad with iPadOS 26.2.1, while it was successful on my iPhone with iOS 26.3 RC.

iPad logs

iPhone logs

Weird displaying error

IMG_87221179×2556 161 KB

After looking at message detail with swipe gesture and got back to messaging screen with swipe, wallpaper shifts top left and message field disappears.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.95.0/830578cf076f6952abfcc59437942aff1a4379886e8d84dc20e83dc16914e5ec.zip

Signal greets me every morning with a message that the backup couldn’t be performed. Phone is connected via Wifi all night, mobile data is enabled, charging via MagSafe. It hasn’t worked since my initial bug report in December

Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.90 release iOS Beta Feedback
Automatic backup didn’t run in the background tonight and the night before https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.90.0/e463a2d53062b864c97c84a7fc2735361fba2e38faa1706a953f529d9408f72d.zip

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.95.0/80e29b29b66ebfbde137b891579a218acb1301c1fcd67728af3537d1430d059f.zip

posts.name: Dmitry Dolmatov
posts.cooked:
1. If you swipe messages to the left (to reply) and engage the Home Indicator, Signal will lock and stop responding to actions.

  2. Keyboard disappears following (message details)

  3. Backups don’t work.

  4. Notifications are not arriving. The feature (re-registering push notifications does not help)

    iPhone 11/12:

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.95.0/f7d61c918698af03ff5a80b71529262af996ba79bbe1ad0a3ffb700e970cb583.zip

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.95.0/1ebd1bf7dc29d78f0d69ea33b9bf7d201e2dc20e68558a91ca8623ac9f7226fa.zip

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.96 release.
